definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps

sentences.english: Example: Seeing a spider, even on the TV, always gives me the heebie-jeebies.
sentences.chinese: 即便是在电视上看到蜘蛛，我也会觉得害怕。

sentences.english: I felt uncomfortable, and even afraid, of going out by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我很是不爽，甚至都害怕自个儿出去买东西了。

sentences.english: This is the phobia or fear of death as such or any dead objects.
sentences.chinese: 这种恐惧症的源头是对死亡或者尸体的害怕。

sentences.english: In the reality, it's gonna never happen.
sentences.chinese: 而今害怕那真实得无法挣脱的梦境。

sentences.english: I killed someone, so I had to go. Otherwise I would be captured and sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 杀了人，我害怕被警察抓住判刑枪毙。

sentences.english: She shut her eyes in fear.
I hate bugs, they give me the willies.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌虫子，他们使我很害怕。

sentences.english: Julia is afraid she will embarrass herself and the whole team.
sentences.chinese: 茱丽雅害怕自己将舞蹈队带来麻烦甚至搞砸。

sentences.english: Most people come to Toastmasters to overcome their fear of public speaking.
sentences.chinese: 许多人到宴会主持人之家来克服他们害怕演说的问题。

sentences.english: He looks quite normal but there's something about him that gives me the willies .
sentences.chinese: 他看上去很正常，但是他有某种特点使我感到害怕。

sentences.english: They fear (and not that unreasonably) that this would give the debtor states less incentive to reform.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有缘由地害怕这会致使借贷国家不思改革。

sentences.english: Not even the patients panicked, says the nurse.
sentences.chinese: 不只是病人会感到害怕，我们也是，一名护士说。

sentences.english: I know, I truelly known that, my self-esteem is strong, that might hurt you. But, I dont mean to.
sentences.chinese: 我也害怕受伤，但是我还是会为自己喜欢的人付出。

sentences.english: Local officials Dinh Cong Than and Nguyen Van Binh say most of all the people fear unemployment
sentences.chinese: 当地官员丁公俊和阮文平说，大多数人害怕失业。

sentences.english: Until then he had been afraid to expose his naked souls.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，他一直害怕展现自己赤露的灵魂。

sentences.english: Fear of consequences is a common deterrent from wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 一般不做坏事遏阻原因是害怕后果。

definition: to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to fear/afraid/extremely nervous/for fear that/to avoid/so as not to
